meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a close friend or brother.
meanings.sent1: My bubbas always have my back when I need them.
meanings.sent2: I love hanging out with my bubbas on the weekends.
meanings.sent3: We may argue sometimes, but my bubbas are always there for me.
meanings.sent4: Even though we're not related, my bubbas feel like family to me.
meanings.sent5: The bond between me and my bubbas is unbreakable.

meanings.definition: Plural form of bubba, meaning a big, strong, or macho man.
meanings.sent1: The football team was full of burly bubbas ready to tackle anyone.
meanings.sent2: The group of bubbas at the gym were lifting heavy weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The bubbas at the construction site joked around while lifting heavy beams.
meanings.sent4: In the bar, a group of bubbas stood out with their towering height and broad shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The bubbas in the wrestling team were known for their unbeatable strength.
